[[Image:Simonne d'Ardenne 21 September 1: On [[21 September]] [[1937]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
*'''Description:''' 1-page, handwritten letter, enclosed with a copy of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' (published on this day) sent by Tolkien as a gift to Simonne d'Ardenne.
*'''Archive:''' The letter is kept at the [[Wikipedia:University of Liège
